subject: Re: Heading styles under "Nearby Accommodation" on https://royalrehab.com.au/for-visitors/facilities/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Martina,

We have already made the changes and ready for you to review it. In the future, it is highly recommended to use Elementor when editing the page. It is easier to use and you will see the changes right away. Just click on the "Edit with Elementor" under the Page title, please refer to the image below. 



Check out the short video on how we edit page using Elementor in the link below.

https://www.loom.com/share/58d1a7a8a54c420aad3b4c22a95a3028

Please let us know if you would like further changes.

Hi Rica

I followed your advice and logged and logged back into WordPress but still can't see my changes on the live website. Here is a screenshot of my changes in WordPress:



Thank you Rica for looking into this.

Cheers

MARTINA FOX​

Hi Martina,

I am not seeing that too. Can you please refresh your page or logout and log back in to the Wordpress dashboard then try to add it again?

If you encounter the same issue, please send us the details so we can try to add it in our end to see if that's gonna work.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Thank you very much Rica for fixing up the heading styles.

In the meantime I have added:

Studio 8 Residences

T: 02 9296 5707

to the very top of the Nearby Accommodation list but it is not displaying on https://royalrehab.com.au/for-visitors/facilities/ despite clearing my cache in Chrome. Could you please advise what I need to do.

Thank you very much Rica.

MARTINA FOX​

Hi Martina,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.  We have made changes with the codes under  Nearby Accommodation to fix it. In the future, try to link the words or phrase first before styling it or changing the font style. Hope that make sense.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
